post.summary: GetKubernetesCluster return KubeAuth with Kubernetes config.

kube_auth.description: KubeAuth represents Kubernetes / kubectl authentication and authorization information.

post.summary: ListKubernetesClusters returns a list of all registered Kubernetes clusters.

items.description:
Cluster contains public info about Kubernetes cluster.
TODO Do not use inner messages in all public APIs (for consistency).

operators.description: Operators contains list of operators installed in Kubernetes cluster.

psmdb.description: Operator contains all information about operator installed in Kubernetes cluster.

status.description:
OperatorsStatus defines status of operators installed in Kubernetes cluster.

 - OPERATORS_STATUS_INVALID: OPERATORS_STATUS_INVALID represents unknown state.
 - OPERATORS_STATUS_OK: OPERATORS_STATUS_OK represents that operators are installed and have supported API version.
 - OPERATORS_STATUS_UNSUPPORTED: OPERATORS_STATUS_UNSUPPORTED represents that operators are installed, but doesn't have supported API version.
 - OPERATORS_STATUS_NOT_INSTALLED: OPERATORS_STATUS_NOT_INSTALLED represents that operators are not installed.

xtradb.description: Operator contains all information about operator installed in Kubernetes cluster.

status.description:
OperatorsStatus defines status of operators installed in Kubernetes cluster.

 - OPERATORS_STATUS_INVALID: OPERATORS_STATUS_INVALID represents unknown state.
 - OPERATORS_STATUS_OK: OPERATORS_STATUS_OK represents that operators are installed and have supported API version.
 - OPERATORS_STATUS_UNSUPPORTED: OPERATORS_STATUS_UNSUPPORTED represents that operators are installed, but doesn't have supported API version.
 - OPERATORS_STATUS_NOT_INSTALLED: OPERATORS_STATUS_NOT_INSTALLED represents that operators are not installed.

KubernetesClusterStatus defines status of Kubernetes cluster.

 - KUBERNETES_CLUSTER_STATUS_INVALID: KUBERNETES_CLUSTER_STATUS_INVALID represents unknown state.
 - KUBERNETES_CLUSTER_STATUS_OK: KUBERNETES_CLUSTER_STATUS_OK represents that Kubernetes cluster is accessible.
 - KUBERNETES_CLUSTER_STATUS_UNAVAILABLE: KUBERNETES_CLUSTER_STATUS_UNAVAILABLE represents that Kubernetes cluster is not accessible.

post.summary: RegisterKubernetesCluster registers an existing Kubernetes cluster in PMM.

kube_auth.description: KubeAuth represents Kubernetes / kubectl authentication and authorization information.

post.summary: UnregisterKubernetesCluster removes a registered Kubernetes cluster from PMM.

force.description:
If true then Kubernetes cluster will be deleted
even if it contains database clusters.

post.summary: CreatePSMDBCluster creates a new PSMDB cluster.

name.title:
PSMDB cluster name.
a DNS-1035 label must consist of lower case alphanumeric characters or '-',
start with an alphabetic character, and end with an alphanumeric character
(e.g. 'my-name',  or 'abc-123', regex used for validation is '[a-z]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?')

params.description: PSMDBClusterParams represents PSMDB cluster parameters that can be updated.

replicaset.description:
ReplicaSet container parameters.
TODO Do not use inner messages in all public APIs (for consistency).

compute_resources.description: ComputeResources represents container computer resources requests or limits.

params.description: UpdatePSMDBClusterParams represents PSMDB cluster parameters that can be updated.

compute_resources.description: ComputeResources represents container computer resources requests or limits.

connection_credentials.description:
PSMDBCredentials is a credentials to connect to PSMDB.

post.summary: ListPSMDBClusters returns a list of PSMDB clusters.

items.description:
Cluster represents PSMDB cluster information.
TODO Do not use inner messages in all public APIs (for consistency).

finished_steps.description: Finished steps of the operaion; can decrease or increase compared to the previous value.

message.description: Text describing the current operation progress step.

total_steps.description: Total steps needed to finish the operation; can decrease or increase compared to the previous value.

params.description: PSMDBClusterParams represents PSMDB cluster parameters that can be updated.

replicaset.description:
ReplicaSet container parameters.
TODO Do not use inner messages in all public APIs (for consistency).

compute_resources.description: ComputeResources represents container computer resources requests or limits.

state.description:
PSMDBClusterState represents PSMDB cluster CR state.

 - PSMDB_CLUSTER_STATE_INVALID: PSMDB_CLUSTER_STATE_INVALID represents unknown state.
 - PSMDB_CLUSTER_STATE_CHANGING: PSMDB_CLUSTER_STATE_CHANGING represents a cluster being changed.
 - PSMDB_CLUSTER_STATE_READY: PSMDB_CLUSTER_STATE_READY represents a cluster without pending changes.
 - PSMDB_CLUSTER_STATE_FAILED: PSMDB_CLUSTER_STATE_FAILED represents a failed cluster.
 - PSMDB_CLUSTER_STATE_DELETING: PSMDB_CLUSTER_STATE_DELETING represents a cluster being deleting.
 - PSMDB_CLUSTER_STATE_PAUSED: PSMDB_CLUSTER_STATE_PAUSED represents a cluster is paused.

state.description:
XtraDBClusterState represents XtraDB cluster CR state.

 - XTRA_DB_CLUSTER_STATE_INVALID: XTRA_DB_CLUSTER_STATE_INVALID represents unknown state.
 - XTRA_DB_CLUSTER_STATE_CHANGING: XTRA_DB_CLUSTER_STATE_CHANGING represents a cluster being changed.
 - XTRA_DB_CLUSTER_STATE_READY: XTRA_DB_CLUSTER_STATE_READY represents a cluster without pending changes.
 - XTRA_DB_CLUSTER_STATE_FAILED: XTRA_DB_CLUSTER_STATE_FAILED represents a failed cluster.
 - XTRA_DB_CLUSTER_STATE_DELETING: XTRA_DB_CLUSTER_STATE_DELETING represents a cluster being deleting.
 - XTRA_DB_CLUSTER_STATE_PAUSED: XTRA_DB_CLUSTER_STATE_PAUSED represents a cluster is paused.
